EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
ANTIGUA.
1. M/V ISLANDER SANK IN 17-08.71N 061-35.30W AT 251655Z NOV.
   FOUR PERSONS MISSING. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
   INMARSAT-C: 422799024, PHONE: 59 659 670 9292,
   FAX: 59 659 663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2782/12.
